moves.11... Be7 12. O-O-O: white is much more opened on black camp
moves.17. a3 Rb7 18. Qf2: this is a terrible mistake: a7 is not the crucial pawn.
moves.19. bxc3 Qxc3+: there is no escape. Every response is now fatale
moves.20. Qc2 Qxa3+ 21. Kd2 Rb2 22. Bxh7+: why not? just a short momentum
moves.24. Bc2 Bf5: followed, for example by d5-d4-d3... End of story.
